long_description: Designed specifically for the iPhone 5, this Topeak Smartphone Dry Bag delivers water-resistant protection for your device and mounts conveniently on your bike for easy access while riding. Thermoplastic urethane dry bag securely holds your smart phone; clear touch window prominently displays phone screen for use; camera window lets you take snapshots with ease. Sonically welded seams provide water-resistant protection, eliminating stitch breakdown and possible entry points for moisture. Included Topeak QuickClick(TM) mounting system allows easy, tool-free attachment of dry bag to stem or handlebar.
short_description: Designed specifically for the iPhone 5, this Topeak Smartphone Dry Bag delivers water-resistant protection for your device and mounts conveniently on your bike for easy access while riding.
